assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have no conflicts of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: There are no other data associated with this manuscript. WDR37 genetic variants have been submitted to ClinVar, accession numbers SCV001911449–SCV001911451.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the Institutional Review Boards of the Children’s Hospital of Wisconsin.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained for research analysis.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Consent to publish was obtained from all participants and/or legal guardians; no identifying information is included in this manuscript.
